job_tasks.phrase: collecting business requirements from product stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to gather and understand business needs from stakeholders.

job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate possible architecture solutions considering business and technology requirements.
job_tasks.justification: This task involves aligning technical solutions with business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Be responsible for business-related data governance processes, technical implementation, and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems
job_tasks.justification: This covers the implementation and maintenance of data processing and storage, key aspects of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: improving personalization and leveraging GenAI to build fine-tuned models for more relevant recommendations.
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions building fine-tuned models and using GenAI, which falls under modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: encompassing ML engineering, model design, and training.
job_tasks.justification: Directly lists core modeling activities: design and training.

job_tasks.phrase: Combine innovation with reuse by abstracting ML/AI concepts from one application to a generalized framework
job_tasks.justification: This involves adapting and generalizing ML/AI concepts, indicating a modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop production-grade ML systems, from models to features and pipelines, accounting for reliability, scalability, real-time requirements, monitoring, and retraining.
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on building and deploying systems, which is software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Build readable and reusable code, applying code quality best practices and using standard libraries.
job_tasks.justification: Describes core software development practices like writing clean and reusable code.

job_tasks.phrase: Choose the right technology or coding methodology and refactor and simplify code when necessary.
job_tasks.justification: Involves making technology choices and improving code, which are software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop production-grade ML systems, from models to features and pipelines, accounting for reliability, scalability, real-time requirements, monitoring, and retraining.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'production-grade', 'reliability', 'scalability', 'monitoring', and 'retraining' are hallmarks of MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Take full ownership of services end-to-end by actively monitoring system health, performance, and business impact. Set relevant service level objectives (SLOs) and act accordingly when they are not met.
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring system health, performance, and setting SLOs are key MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: Be responsible for business-related data governance processes, technical implementation, and maintenance of data processing services and storage systems, as well as ML governance processes.
job_tasks.justification: ML governance processes are part of MLOps.

soft_skills.phrase: You will work closely together with the other Machine Learning Scientists and Machine Learning Engineers as well as with Data Engineers, Software Engineers and Product Managers.
Contribute to the internal ML/AI community by sharing knowledge and participating in internal ML programs.
Coach others through evidence and clear communication, explaining advanced technical concepts in simpler terms.
Achieve mutually agreeable solutions by staying adaptable, communicating ideas in clear coherent language, and practicing active listening.
Continuously evolve your craft by keeping up to date with the latest developments in ML/AI and related technologies and upskilling as needed.
Own the design and delivery of ML systems, from initial idea generation and collecting business requirements from product stakeholders to implementation.
Combine innovation with reuse by abstracting ML/AI concepts from one application to a generalized framework
You will own the design and delivery of ML systems
Take full ownership of services end-to-end

classification.rationale: The job explicitly mentions leveraging GenAI to build fine-tuned models and references frameworks like LangChain, Pinecone, and FAISS. It emphasizes building production-grade systems with a focus on user experience and personalized recommendations, aligning perfectly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer.
